settings.description: Relaxing and elegant, the mid-century and Japandi styles are all the rage. With its clean lines and subtle details, the Tate Collection is a nod to some of the most sought-after interior design trends and will blend perfectly in any home.

Dreaming of evenings spent contemplating the sun setting into the Mediterranean? A one-way ticket to Santorini may be out of reach, but the Sorrento collection is the next best thing. With its unique style featuring a white stucco-like finish and a curvilinear silhouette, it will infuse your home with a relaxing vibe.

Are you tired of trends that come and go faster than the wink of an eye? Then the Pam collection is just what you have been looking for. Featuring a timeless mid-century modern design in an elegant walnut oak colour, the Pam pieces never go out of style. However, classic doesn't mean boring with eye-catching details like their sleek curvilinear handles and tapered legs.

With its clean lines and soft texture fabric, the Bradley collection will never get out of style. It will match any contemporary interior, including mid-century modern, industrial, and Scandinavian-inspired homes.

The Kona collection will bring a Boho Chic flair into any home. With trendy details such as obround cutouts and woven faux rattan, each element of the collection will not only provide much-needed storage but also adds texture and interest to your interior. The Kona collection is available in a breezy white finish for a coastal-inspired look or a warm Maple for those who prefer a more organic feel.

Influenced by Japandi design, with its straight lines and organic wood grain. Its harmonious minimalist style will fit beautifully in boho, coastal, Scandi, Hampton, contemporary or rustic settings. Create an elegant and harmonious look throughout your home by adopting the matching TV stand, coffee table, side table, dining stool and various sized dining tables.

The Ethan collection pulls its inspiration from sleek mid-century modern design. With its dark timber wood tones and unique slated construction, it will fit seamlessly in a wide range of interiors, including rustic, industrial and contemporary settings, so it can accompany you throughout the years even if your tastes evolve.

The mortise and tenon style plays well with a variety of design trends, making our Bruny Collection just the right fit for many décor. Depending on how you style it, it will shine in rustic, farmhouse, boho chic, Japandi, Scandinavian, or even mid-century inspired interiors.

Crisp linen is always in style. Our Lorne collection will bring a breath of fresh air into your interior, whether you are into beach-influenced style like coastal, Hampton or boho, or are drawn to the clean lines of mid-century modern and Scandinavian decor.

With its retro style and rounded shapes, the Phoebe collection is sure to make a statement in your living room. It will instantly update your boho, contemporary, Scandinavian-inspired or rustic home with a playful vintage twist that will wow your guests.

We pulled our inspiration from the minimalist lines of Scandinavian and Japanese styles to create the Raku sofa. Understated and refined, its streamlined design will fit perfectly in Japandi, minimalist, boho, and coastal homes.
With its bright white colour scheme and classic lines, the Coco collection was inspired by the grand holiday homes of the Hamptons, a reference for understated luxury and a refined art de vivre.

With its clean lines and breezy charm, the Cuppa collection feels like a breath of fresh air. Its coastal-inspired aesthetic associating bright whites and natural wood tones will blend right into any interior.
Our Mia collection is an ode to simpler times yet firmly anchored in modernity. Each piece is unique, embracing the natural beauty of the wood grain, giving the collection a cozy and earthy feel.
Retro style is all the rage, and the Muzi collection is the perfect illustration of why we were inspired by the rounded design of the iconic 1960s television.

With its tapered legs and clean lines, the Nobu collection represents the essence of modern Scandinavian style. Its understated sophistication and utter practicality make the Nobu collection the perfect addition to any home.
Sven collection was crafted to provide a solution to your needs without sacrificing taste and elegance. Our signature white oak finish and minimalist lines make each piece a statement in itself.
Rest easy and choose a bed from our selection of styles to suit your home. Look out for our Timber Bed frames!
The harmony shines with its clean lines and simple design, making it the perfect addition to your home
The clean, minimalist lines of the Arch collection will enchant those who embrace a streamlined modern aesthetic. making it the perfect addition to your home

settings.icon_subtext: We ensure quality is within your budget.
Pay for it with instalments, interest free.
We got you covered for up to 20 years.

settings.heading: Collection
settings.content: We associate bedrooms with comfort, privacy, and coziness – so that’s exactly what the furniture has to reflect.They’re trendy, up-to-date, and deliver on all the homely amenities that you’re used to.
